src:
侍ジャパン　稲葉監督が苦渋の決断　不振坂本に代打・山田　押し出し四球から逆転

05 Nov 2019

　「プレミア１２・１次ラウンド、日本－ベネズエラ」（５日、桃園国際野球場）
　侍ジャパン・稲葉監督が苦渋の決断を下した。
　２点を追う八回、１死満塁。不振に苦しむ１番・坂本（巨人）の打順で代打・山田（ヤクルト）を起用。その初球に特大ファウルを打ち相手にプレッシャーをかけると、フルカウントから押し出し四球を選んだ。
　１点差に迫り、なお１死満塁で菊池（広島）が同点適時打を放った。さらに近藤（日本ハム）も押し出し四球を選び、逆転した。
text:
SAMURAI JAPAN Director Inaba makes a difficult decision.

05 Nov 2019

"Premier 12.1st Round, Japan-Venezuela" (5th, Taoyuan International Baseball Stadium)
侍 Director SAMURAI JAPAN and Inaba made a difficult decision.
八 Eight times after two points, one death. No. 1 who suffers from sluggishness, Sakamoto (giant) strikes in the order of hitting, Yamada (Yakult). When he hit an oversized foul on the first ball and put pressure on his opponent, he pushed out the full count and chose a four ball.
】 The point was close to 1 point, and Kikuchi (Hiroshima) made the same timely hit with 1 death. In addition, Kondo (Nippon Ham) picked out the four balls and reversed.
